'At the end of the exposure period, the samples should be examined for any changes in physical properties (e.g., appearance, clarity or color of solution, dissolution/disintegration for dosage forms such as capsules, etc.) and for assay and degradants by a method suitably validated for products likely to arise from photochemical degradation processes.'可被翻译为：光暴露试验一结束，应立即检查样品物理性质（如外观、溶液的澄清度或颜色、固体制剂如胶囊剂等的溶出度/崩解时限）的所有变化，并进行含量和降解产物的测定。所用方法应经过相应的方法学验证，证实其适用于检测光化学降解过 程中所产生的物质。
'Photostability testing should be conducted on at least one primary batch of the drug product if appropriate. The standard conditions for photostability testing are described in ICH Q1B.'可被翻译为：如必要，至少应用一批注册批样品进行光稳定性试验，其标准条件在ICH Q1B项下有专述。
'Batch release is the final decision to release the product to the market regardless whether RTR testing or end product testing is employed.'可被翻译为：无论是否进行实时放行检测或最终产品检验，批放行都 是产品上市前放行的最终决策。

根据上述已知信息，请将'The extent of drug product testing should be established by assessing whether or not acceptable change has occurred at the end of the light exposure testing as described in the Decision Flow Chart for Photostability Testing of Drug Products.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 制剂测试范围应依据“制剂光稳定性决策流程图”，通过评估光暴露试验结束时是否产生了可接受的变化来进行设计。

instruction:
已知信息：
'This Appendix is based extensively on section 505(b) of the Act and regulations in 21 CFR part 314. As a result, this section contains extensive mandatory language. This mandatory language is used whenever FDA regulations require the submission of certain information. Unlike other guidance documents in which mandatory language is typically accompanied by the related cite, to make the guidance more user friendly and less cumbersome, we do not cite each regulation each time we discuss a requirement.'可被翻译为：这个附录大多是基于法案第505(b)条和21 CFR部分314中的条例。因此，这个部分含有广泛的强制性语言。当FDA法规要求提交特定资料时使用这种强制性语言。与其他指导原则文件不同（其中强制性语言通常附带相关引用，以使指导原则更加用户友好和不那么繁琐），每次进行要求讨论时我们没有列举各项规章制度。
'Because this guidance discusses in great detail what must be submitted in an NDA (particularly a 505(b)(2) NDA) or an ANDA (505(j)), the guidance differs from most guidances in that it contains extensive mandatory language, especially in the Appendices. This mandatory language is used whenever the Act and/or FDA regulations require the submission of certain information. Unlike other documents in which mandatory language is accompanied by the related cite, to make the guidance more user friendly and less cumbersome, we do not cite each regulation each time we discuss a requirement.'可被翻译为：因为本指导原则非常详细的讨论了NDA（尤其是5059(b)(2)NDA）或ANDA （505(j)）必须提交的内容，所以本指导原则不同于大部分指导原则，其中包含广泛的强制语言，尤其是附录中。当法案和/或FDA法规要求提交某些信息时使用这种强制性语言。与其他文件不同（其中强制性语言附带相关引用，以使指导原则更加用户友好和不那么繁琐），每次进行要求讨论时我们没有列举各项规章制度。
'See section 506(c) of the FD&C Act; 21 CFR part 314, subpart H.'可被翻译为：参见FD&C Act的506(c)部分；21 CFR第314部分，第H分部分。
'In 21 CFR 1271.10, the regulations identify the criteria for regulation solely under section 361 of the PHS Act and 21 CFR Part 1271.'可被翻译为：在21 CFR 1271.10中，条例根据PHS法案第361部分和21CFR第1271部分确定了唯一的标准。

根据上述已知信息，请将'This section of the guidance is based largely on section 505(j) of the Act and regulations in 21 CFR part 314, subpart C. As a result, this section contains extensive mandatory language. This mandatory language is used whenever the Act and/or FDA regulations require the submission of certain information. Unlike other guidance documents in which mandatory language is typically accompanied by the related cite, to make the guidance more user friendly and less cumbersome, we do not cite each regulation each time we discuss a requirement.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 这部分的指导原则大多是基于法案第505(j)条和21 CFR部分314，子部分C 中的法规。因此，这个部分含有广泛的强制性语言。当FDA法规要求提交特定资料时使用这种强制性语言。不同于其他指导原则文件（其中强制性语言通常附带相关引用，以使指导原则更加用户友好和不那么繁琐），每次进行要求讨论时我们没有列举各项规章制度。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Successful electronic transmission of ICSRs relies on standard common data elements and syntactical definition of the electronic message.'可被翻译为：ICSR 电子传输的成功依赖于电子信息的标准通用数据元素和语法定义。
'This IG is also intended to support the implementation of software and tools for creating, editing, sending and receiving electronic ICSR messages.'可被翻译为：该IG还可用于支持创建、编辑、发送和接收电子ICSR消息的软件和工具的安装。
'User Guidance This data element contains the message identifier (also called the Message Wrapper).It is a unique tracking identifier assigned to a specific ICH ICSR message transmitted by the sender. One ICH ICSR message contains one and only one ICSR.'可被翻译为：用户指导原则 该数据元素包含信息标识符元素（也称为信息包装）。是分配给由发送者传输的特定ICH ICSR消息的唯一跟踪标识符。一个ICH ICSR消息包含一个且仅有一个ICSR。
'ACK.B.r.2 Local Report Number User Guidance This data element captures the number assigned to the ICH ICSR message by the organisation that received the ICH ICSR.'可被翻译为：ACK.B.r.2本地报告编号 用户指导原则 该数据元素记录由接收ICH ICSR的机构分配给每个ICH ICSR消息的编号消 息。

根据上述已知信息，请将'The message standard from which this guidance is derived is fully capable of conveying a comprehensive ICSR.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 本指导原则所依据的信息标准完全有能力传输全面的所依据的 ICSR消息。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Article 36 Cosmetics for children shall comply with requirements for quality and safety of cosmetics for children in laws, regulations, mandatory national standards, technical specifications, and Good Manufacturing Practice for Cosmetics, etc., and shall be indicated on the product label as specified by the NMPA.'可被翻译为：第三十六条 供儿童使用的化妆品应当符合法律、法规、强制性国家标准、技术规范以及化妆品生产质量管理规范等关于儿童化妆品质量安全的要求，并按照国家药品监督管理局的规定在产品标签上进行标注。
'Article 26 If the registrant or the filing entity of cosmetics entrusts manufacturing of cosmetics, it shall entrust one that has obtained the manufacturing license for the relevant cosmetics, and shall supervise the whole manufacturing process of the entrusted enterprise, and be responsible for quality and safety of the cosmetics entrusted with manufacturing. The contract manufacturer shall have the corresponding manufacturing conditions, and organize manufacturing in accordance with the laws, regulations, mandatory national standards, technical specifications and contractual agreements, be responsible for the manufacturing and be supervised by the entrusting party.'可被翻译为：第二十六条 化妆品注册人、备案人委托生产化妆品的，应当委托取得相应化妆品生产许可的生产企业生产，并对其生产活动全过程进行监督，对委托生产的化妆品的质量安全负责。受托生产企业应当具备相应的生产条件，并依照法律、法规、强制性国家标准、技术规范和合同约定组织生产，对生产活动负责，接受委托方的监督。
'Article 15 The Cosmetics Manufacturing License shall be indicated with the license number, the manufacturer’s name, domicile, manufacturing address, unified social credit identifier, legal representative or responsible person, the manufacturing licensed items, expiry date, issuing authority and date of issuance, etc.'可被翻译为：第十五条 化妆品生产许可证应当载明许可证编号、生产企业名称、住所、生产地址、统一社会信用代码、法定代表人或者负责人、生产许可项目、有效期、发证机关、发证日期等。
'(4) having technicians who are suited to the varieties, quantity and manufacturing licensed items, etc. of the cosmetics manufactured;'可被翻译为：（四）有与生产的化妆品品种、数量和生产许可项目等相适应的技术人员；

根据上述已知信息，请将'For those who have the manufacturing conditions of children's skin care and eye care cosmetics shall be specially indicated in the manufacturing licensed items.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 具备儿童护肤类、眼部护肤类化妆品生产条件的，应当在生产许可项目中特别标注。

instruction:
已知信息：
'C. Placebo-controlled trials enrolling outpatients with ABECB-COPD:'可被翻译为：C ABECB-COPD门诊患者的安慰剂对照试验
'22 See References, section B., Clinical trials evaluating hospitalized patients with ABECB-COPD.'可被翻译为：22 见参考文献章节B评估ABECB-COPD住院患者的临床试验
'21 See References, section A., Treatment guidelines and reviews of ABECB-COPD.'可被翻译为：21 见参考文献章节A治疗指导方针和ABECB-COPD的审核
'6 See References, section D., Publications that provide definitions for COPD and ABECB-COPD.'可被翻译为：6 见参考D部分“提供COPD和ABECB-COPD定义的发表文章”。

根据上述已知信息，请将'24 See References, section C., Placebo-controlled trials enrolling outpatients with ABECB-COPD.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 24 见参考文献章节CABECB-COPD门诊患者的安慰剂对照试验

instruction:
已知信息：
'Article 59 Highly active materials or products and printed packaging materials should be stored in safe and secure areas.'可被翻译为：第五十九条 高活性的物料或产品以及印刷包装材料应当贮存于安全的区域。
'Article 124: Printed packaging materials should be properly stored in specific area so as to exclude unauthorized access.'可被翻译为：第一百二十四条 印刷包装材料应当设置专门区域妥善存 放，未经批准人员不得进入。
'Article 124 Printed packaging materials should be properly stored in specific area so as to exclude unauthorized access. Cut labels and other loose printed packaging materials should be stored and transported in separate closed containers so as to avoid mixups.'可被翻译为：第一百二十四条 印刷包装材料应当设置专门区域妥善存放，未经批准人员不得进入。切割式标签或其他散装印刷包装材料应当分别置于密闭容器内储运，以防混淆。
'Article 131 Each packaging container of rejected materials, intermediate, bulk and finished products should be clearly marked, and properly stored in restricted areas.'可被翻译为：第一百三十一条 不合格的物料、中间产品、待包装产品和成品的每个包装容器上均应当有清晰醒目的标志，并在隔离区内妥善保存。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Article 59: Highly active materials or products and printed packaging materials should be stored in safe and secure areas.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 第五十九条 高活性的物料或产品以及印刷包装材料应当 贮存于安全的区域。

instruction:
已知信息：
'If there are important differences in the benefit-risk profiles among populations within an indication, benefit-risk evaluation should be presented by population, if possible.'可被翻译为：如果适应症中的人群 之间的利益 - 风险特征存在重大差异，则尽可能由按人群展示利益 - 风险评 估。
'Section 18.2 (Benefit-Risk Analysis Evaluation) Although the evaluation of benefit should be limited to approved use (see Section 17 of the Guideline), the overall benefit-risk evaluation should take into account the risks associated with all uses of the product.'可被翻译为：章节8.2（利益-风险分析评估） 尽管利益评估仅限于已批准的使用（见指南的章节17），但总体利益-风险评估 应考虑到与该产品的所有使用相关的风险。
'Benefit-Risk Analysis Evaluation'可被翻译为：利益-风险分析评估
'The demonstrated safety profile will be essential for the benefit-risk balance in a defined patient population.'可被翻译为：经证明的安全性特征对于特定患者人群的获益风险平衡将是必不可少的。

根据上述已知信息，请将'3.18.2 Benefit-Risk Analysis Evaluation A benefit-risk profile is specific to an indication and population.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 3.18.2 利益-风险分析评估 利益-风险特征是根据适应症和人群特定的。

instruction:
已知信息：
'After a new drug is approved, the effectiveness and safety of the new drug are reconfirmed through an investigation conducted during the first four to six years of marketing.'可被翻译为：新药获得批准后，在上市的头4〜6年内，进行的有关新药有效性和安全性的调查，对新药的有效性和安全性进行再确认。
'6 Interim data and study reports can be submitted in your IND annual report, for FDA review, if guidance is desired.'可被翻译为：6 如果需要指导原则，可在您的IND年度报告中提交期中数据和研究报告供FDA评审。
'8.3.10 MONITORING VISIT REPORTS To document site visits by, and findings of, the monitor X'可被翻译为：8.3.10 监察随访报告 记录监察员的现 场访问及结论 X
'For example, in a non inferiority study comparing a new TPO-R agonist versus an approved TPO-R agonist a study duration of approximate one year, including 6 months treatment plus up to 6 months follow up may be acceptable.'可被翻译为：例如,对一个 新的血小板生成素受体激动剂药物与已获批血小板生成素受体激动剂药物进行 比较的非劣效性研究大约需要一年时间。其中包括6个月治疗和6个月随访，这 是可以接受的。

根据上述已知信息，请将'4 apparently unconfounded reports within 6 months of approval; plausible time to onset. targeted follow up of reports with site visit to one hospital.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 在批准后 6个月内 发生了4 例明显无 混杂因素 的报告； 至事件发 生的时间 合理 对一家医 院进行研 究中心访 视得出的 定向随访 报告。

instruction:
已知信息：
'immobilized enzyme'可被翻译为：固定化酶
'enzymatic synthesis'可被翻译为：酶合成
'(i)drug-metabolising enzymes (cytochrome P450 enzymes, (CYPs), phase II enzymes),'可被翻译为：（i）药物代谢酶（细胞色素P450酶、（CYP）、II相酶），
'A non-protein component of an enzyme required for its activity. It can promote the activation of enzymes and reactants, and can be divided into coenzymes and coenzymes.'可被翻译为：一种酶的活性所需要的一种非蛋白质成分。能促进酶及反应物进入活化状态，分辅基和辅酶。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Enzymes made by physically or chemically binding enzymes to water-insoluble macromolecular carriers or by embedding enzymes in microcapsules of water-insoluble gels or semi-permeable membranes. The general stability of the enzyme after immobilization is increased, it is easy to be separated from the reaction system, and it is easy to control and can be used repeatedly.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 用物理的或化学的方法使酶与水不溶性大分子载体结合或把酶包埋在水不溶性凝胶或半透膜的微囊体中制成的酶。酶固定化后一般稳定性增加，易从反应系统中分离，且易于控制，能反复多次使用。

instruction:
已知信息：
'There are several terminologies and controlled vocabularies that are used to describe or code information within an ICSR.'可被翻译为：存在数个术语和受控词汇，用于描述或编码 ICSR中的信息。
'3.2 Code Sets, Terminologies and Vocabularies for E2B(R3)'可被翻译为：3.2 E2B（R3）的代码集、术语和词汇
'Some of these terminologies or code sets are general and are used by many applications, such as units for mass or time, or country codes.'可被翻译为：这些术语或代码集中的一些术语为通用术语，已被许多应用程序使用，例如用于质量或时间的单位或国家代码。
'Although the technical specifications for the code sets (e.g. Data Types) are provided in Section 3.4, these are current as of printing this IG.'可被翻译为：尽管第 3.4 节提供了代码集的技术规范（例如：数据类型），但这仅在此版本 IG 发布时有效。

根据上述已知信息，请将'This section will address the code sets, terminologies and vocabularies used in this IG.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 本节将介绍该 IG 中使用的代码集、术语和词汇。

instruction:
已知信息：
'At entry, the investigator should evaluate the patient by performing an appropriate history and physical examination. The following information should be recorded on the case report form during the entry examination.'可被翻译为：入组时，研究者应考察患者的病史并进行体格检查，进而评估患者。入组检查过程中记录在病例报告表中的信息应包括以下：
'Each patient should have daily on-therapy assessments of signs and symptoms using a well- defined and reliable PRO instrument. Regardless of how the assessment is conducted (e.g., using an interviewer-administered PRO, interactive voice response via telephone, or electronic capture using a mobile device), the questioning of patients should be performed in a valid, reproducible, and structured way to minimize the potential for inconsistencies in the assessment.16 The ability to detect differences between therapies for a time-to-improvement endpoint may be increased if assessments are done more often (e.g., twice daily). Therapy should be continued as described in the protocol regardless of whether symptoms have improved. Investigators should attempt to allow a minimum of 72 hours on therapy with the trial drug therapy before classifying a patient as a clinical failure; accordingly, investigators may wish to include a 48- to 72-hour visit to ensure there is no substantial clinical worsening at this time.'可被翻译为：应采用定义良好且可靠的PRO量表在治疗过程中每天对每位患者进行症状评估。不管如何进行评估（例如，采用访谈者使用的PRO、通过电话进行交互式语音应答或用移动装置进行电子记录），都应以一种有效、可重现且有结构的方式对患者提问，从而减量减少评估过程中可能存在的不一致。16 如果增加评估的 频率（例如，每日两次），则可能更有把握检测到治疗组之间“至症状改善的时间” 这一终点的差异。不论症状是否改善，都应按方案中的规定继续进行治疗；研究者在将一名患者分类为“临床失败”之前应尽量让患者接受至少72小时的试验药物治疗。因此，研究者可能希望纳入一个48到72小时的访视来确保此时没有明显的临床恶化。
'All signs and symptoms that may be present in patients with ABECB-COPD should be captured on the case report form (symptoms and patient-reported signs should be captured by a PRO instrument), as should current tobacco use.'可被翻译为：正如对当前烟草使用情况的记录一样，应在病例报告表中记录所有可能出现 在ABECB-COPD患者中的症状与体征（症状和患者报告的体征应通过PRO量 表记录）：
'This information should be noted in the protocol case report forms and captured in the electronic dataset.'可被翻译为：这个信息应该在方案病例报告表中注 明，并采集在电子数据集中。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Investigators should document findings from on-therapy office visits on the case report form (e.g., history, physical examination, and laboratory test results). If the investigator contacts the patient by telephone or by another interactive technology, documentation of the specific questions asked, how they were asked, and the responses given should be captured on the case report form. If a well-defined and reliable diary is used to capture patient symptoms during this visit, this information also should be recorded on the case report form.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 研究者应在病例报告表中记录从治疗过程中诊室访视得来的结果（例如，病史，体格检查和实验室检查结果）。如果研究者通过电话或通过其他交互式技术联系患者，则应在病例报告中记录具体的提问、提问的方式和回答。用良好定义且可靠的日记在这次访视中记录患者症状，也应在病例报告表中记录该信息。

instruction:
已知信息：
'The difference in outcome between the active treatment and placebo groups is the measure of treatment effect under the conditions of the trial.'可被翻译为：试验组与 安慰剂组之间结果的差异用来评价在该试验条件下所研究 药物的有效性。
'Evidence of efficacy could be based on significant differences in pair-wise comparisons between dosage groups or between dosage groups and placebo, or on evidence of a significant positive trend with increasing dose, even if no two groups are significantly different.'可被翻译为：药物有效性的证明可以基于配对 比较研究中各剂量组之间或各剂量组与安慰剂之间的显著 性差异，或者即使两组间无显著差异，但有效性有随剂量增 加而显著增加的趋势。
'In a randomized withdrawal trial, subjects receiving a test treatment for a specified time are randomly assigned to continued treatment with the test treatment or to placebo (i.e., withdrawal of active therapy).'可被翻译为：在随机撤药研究中，接受研究药物一段时间治疗的对象 被随机分配到继续使用受试药物治疗或使用安慰剂(即停用 有效药物)治疗。
'·Placebo-controlled trial with a background of best available nonantimicrobial therapy — All patients receive the best available nonantimicrobial therapy and are randomized to receive, in addition, an investigational antibacterial drug or matching placebo. To demonstrate efficacy, the group receiving the investigational antibacterial drug should demonstrate superiority to the control group receiving matching placebo. A three-arm trial with the experimental treatment group, an active comparator group, and a placebo-controlled group permits the demonstration of superiority to placebo and also can provide risk-benefit information relative to an approved comparator.'可被翻译为：·以最佳可用的非抗菌治疗为背景的安慰剂对照试验—所有的患者接受最佳可用的非抗菌治疗并在此基础上随机接受一种研究性抗菌药或匹配的安慰剂。为了证明疗效，接受研究性抗菌药的患者组应证明相对于安慰剂组的优效性。由研究性治疗组、活性对照组和安慰剂对照组组成的三组试验可证明相对于安慰剂的优效性，也可提供相对于批准参比剂的获益风险信息。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Any difference that emerges between the group receiving continued treatment and the group randomized to placebo would demonstrate the effect of the active treatment.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 继续治疗的试验组与随机接受安慰剂的试验组之间出现 的任何差异都可以证明活性治疗的效应。

instruction:
已知信息：
'If an approach documenting assay sensitivity, without confirmative documentation of non-inferiority is chosen, and especially if specific claims in relation to marketed products are intended, the focus of the evaluations should lie on the potential advantages of the investigational compound in other domains (e.g. documenting better safety, ease of administration or administration schedule).'可被翻译为：如果选择了一种旨在证明检测灵敏度，而不验证非劣效性的方法，尤其是对于与已上市药品有关的特定适应症，那么评价的焦点应为研究药物在其他方面的潜在优势（如安全性更好，或更方便服用，服用时间更灵活等）。
'These types of investigations, some of which may be beyond the typical scope of a development program for a specific product, might nevertheless be important for guiding patient selection and providing an appropriate context in which to evaluate the risk-benefit of a particular product.'可被翻译为：这些调查方式，某些可能超出特定药物研发项目的标准范围，却可能对引导患者选择， 提供合适评估特定药物风险-疗效环境来说很重要。
'Especially problematic container closure systems include those that are (1) incongruent with the intended dosage and administration of the product or are (2) atypical for similar products marketed with a different type of container closure.'可被翻译为：特别是，有问题的容 器密闭系统包括（1）与产品的预期剂量和给药不一致或（2）对于用不同类型 的容器密封件上市的类似产品不典型。
'9.5.1 Efficacy and Safety Measurements Assessed and Flow Chart The specific efficacy and safety variables to be assessed and laboratory tests to be conducted, their schedule (days of study, time of day, relation to meals, and the timing of critical measures in relation to test drug administration, e.g., just prior to next dose, two hours after dose), the methods for measuring them, and the persons responsible for the measurements should be described.'可被翻译为：9.5.1 评估的疗效和安全性指标和流程图 应对将要评估的具体疗效和安全性变量、将要开展的实 验室检查，其时间表（研究日、每日时间、与饮食的关系、 以及关键测量与试验药物给药之间的时间关系，例如下一次 给药之前，给药后2小时）、测量方法和负责测量的人员进 行描述。

根据上述已知信息，请将'If such an approach is chosen, especially if specific claims in relation to marketed products are intended, the focus of the evaluations should lie on the potential advantages of the investigational compound in other domains (e.g. documenting better safety, ease of administration or administration schedule).'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 如果选择这种方法，尤其是如果拟定与已上市药品相关的特殊主张， 那么评估的重点应放在该受试化合物是否在其他方面有潜在的优势（如 证实有更 好的安全性，便于给药或较简便的给药计划）。

instruction:
已知信息：
'For biotechnology derived product(s), immunogenicity should be evaluated prospectively.'可被翻译为：对于生物技术产品，应前瞻性评估免疫原性。
'In general, immunogenicity should be investigated prior to marketing authorisation and substantiated  with post-marketing studies.'可被翻译为：一般而言，免疫原性应该在上市前研究，上市后加以证实。
'If this is the case, immunogenicity should be included in the RMP as either a potential or identified risk.'可被翻译为：如果构成潜在风险，应将免疫原性作为一种潜在或已确认的风险纳入风险管理计划中。
'However some sensitivity analyses should be pre-planned to establish whether the conclusions drawn from the primary analysis are robust.'可被翻译为：但某些灵敏度分析应当事先计划，以确定从主要分析中得到的结论是否稳健。

根据上述已知信息，请将'The potential for immunogenicity should be fully evaluated based on the available evidence with appropriate conclusions drawn on whether or not a product may pose such a  (potential) risk.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 基于现有证据，对免疫原性风险进行充分评价，并且得出适当结论“产品是否构成此类潜在风险”。

instruction:
已知信息：
'For the inclusion of patients with typical symptomatology while on PPI therapy into clinical trials, it is therefore considered likewise acceptable that patients are included on the basis of a non-response or insufficient response to PPIs and to standard dose or to double-dose PPI.'可被翻译为：临床研究仅要求纳入正在接受 PPI 治疗且具有典型症状的患者， 因此认为纳 入对标准剂量或双倍剂量的 PPI 治疗无效或效果不佳的患者也同样是可以接受的。
'As long as there is a reasonable representation of the above sub-groups of patients in the main therapeutic study/es, a separate study is not considered necessary.'可被翻译为：如果主要治疗研究中合理代表了上述亚组患者，则无需进行单独研究。
'The inclusion of all age ranges between 0 and 18 years is considered to be necessary and clinical trials should usually be conducted double-blind and placebo-controlled.'可被翻译为：0 岁到 18 岁的儿童都要包含， 而且要采用双盲和安慰剂对照涉及。
'The inclusion of all age ranges (in sufficient numbers) between 0 and 18 years is considered to be necessary and clinical trials should usually be conducted double-blind and placebo-controlled.'可被翻译为：其年龄范围应覆盖0～18岁之间的所有年龄段（足够数量），通常应采用双盲、安慰剂对照的方法。

根据上述已知信息，请将'It is not considered necessary that all patients take the same PPI for the inclusion into such trials, as reasonable homogeneity of such a population can be assumed.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 认为没有必要让所有纳入这些研究的患者服用相同的PPI，因为可以假定这个人群具有合理的同质性。

instruction:
已知信息：
'The clinical trial in children should begin with the investigation of pharmacokinetics (incremental recovery, in vivo half-life, AUC and clearance) in 10 patients of each age cohort.'可被翻译为：从各年龄组选出10名患者，从药动学研究（增量回收率、体内半衰期、AUC和清除率）开始开展儿童临床试验。
'The clinical trial in PUPs should be started when data are available from 10 patients participating in the children trial <12 years with 50 ED each, including a minimum of 5 patients <6 years, and when pharmacokinetic investigations in children <12 years are completed.'可被翻译为：当获得 10 名参与<12 岁儿童试验并分别接受 50 天给药的患者（至少5名<6岁）的数据而且完成<12岁儿童的药动学研究时才能开始PUP 的临床试验。
'Within the application for marketing authorisation, pharmacokinetic data (incremental recovery, in vivo  half-life, AUC and clearance) as well as the completed efficacy and safety trial in 50 children ( to 0 <12 y) followed for  EDs should be submitted.'可被翻译为：在申请上市时，须递交 50 名儿童（0 至 12 岁）服药 50 天后的药动学参数（增量回收率、体内半衰期、药时曲线下面积和清除率）以及完整的疗效及安全性试验资料。
'Within the application for marketing authorisation, pharmacokinetic data (incremental recovery, in vivo half-life, AUC and clearance) as well as the completed efficacy and safety trial in 20 children (0 to <12y) followed for 50 EDs should be submitted.'可被翻译为：在上市许可申请时，需要提交 20 名儿童（0-12 岁）在50天ED内的药动学数据（增量回收率、体内半衰期、AUC和清除率）以及完整的疗效和安全性试验。

根据上述已知信息，请将'The clinical trial in children should begin with the investigation of pharmacokinetics (incremental  recovery, in vivo half-life, AUC and clearance) in 12 patients of each age cohort.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 儿童临床试验应该从药动学研究（增量回收率、体内半衰期、药时曲线下面积和清除率）开始，每组选出 12 名患者进行研究。

instruction:
已知信息：
'The rationale as to why the study must be conducted using an exception from informed consent;'可被翻译为：必须采用知情同意豁免开展该项研究的依据；
'The IRB must also find and document that the requirements for exception from informed consent for emergency research detailed in 21 CFR 50.24 have been met. (See Appendix A for the text of 21 CFR 50.24.) In addition, the IRB must find that the study meets the relevant requirements of 21 CFR Parts 50 and 56.'可被翻译为：IRB还必须确定并用文件证明，符合21 CFR 50.24中所列 举的紧急临床研究豁免知情同意的相关规定。（21 CFR 50.24正文参见附录A）此 外，IRB必须确定，该项研究符合 21 CFR第50和56部分的相关要求。
'Studies involving an exception from the informed consent requirements may proceed only after a sponsor has submitted an IND or IDE9 and received prior written authorization from FDA10 and IRB approval (i.e., the IRB must find and document that specific conditions in the regulations have been met11). (See Appendix A for the text of 21 CFR 50.24.)'可被翻译为：涉及知情同意要求豁免的研究只有在申办方提交了IND或IDE9并事先收到FDA10和IRB书面批准后才可进行（即，IRB必须确定并用文件证明，符合这些法规中的特定要求11 )（21 CFR 50.24正文参见 附录A）
'97. These studies involve an exception from informed consent requirements. Why must an informed consent document be prepared?'可被翻译为：97 研究涉及知情同意要求的豁免，为何还必须准备一份知情同意文件？

根据上述已知信息，请将'7. What must the IRB find and document in order for a study involving an exception from informed consent to proceed?'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 7 IRB必须确定并用文件证明哪些信息，才可开展一项涉及豁免知情同意的研究？

instruction:
已知信息：
'Early engagement with regulatory authorities to understand local/regional requirements and expectations is encouraged and will facilitate the ability to design quality into the study.'可被翻译为：鼓励监管机构早期介入，以了解当地/地区的要求和期 望，并有助于促进将质量设计融入研究中的能力。
'Early discussion with regulators in regions where endpoints, control groups, inclusion criteria or diagnostic criteria might differ should be considered part of planning clinical studies to meet an individual region’s requirements.'可被翻译为：在早期与该地区监管者就研究终点、对照组、入选标准或诊断标准可能存在的差异进行讨论，应被认为是临床研究计划的一部分，以满足新地区监管要求。
'Patient consultation early in the study design process can contribute to this approach and ultimately help to identify the critical to quality factors.'可被翻译为：在研究设计过 程中尽早与患者沟通有助于这种方法，并最终有助于确定关 键质量因素。
'These detailed discussions are especially important if the trial has elements with which there is little past experience (e.g., novel eligibility criteria or efficacy endpoints) or has complex design or analytic features (e.g., noninferiority, bioequivalence, adaptive designs, multiplicity considerations).'可被翻译为：如果试验 在某些方面（例如，新的合格性标准或功效终点）的以往经验较少或者设计或分 析特征（例如，非劣效性、生物等效性、适应性设计、多样性考虑）复杂，则对 这些详细的讨论尤为重要。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Early engagement with regulatory authorities is encouraged, particularly when a study has novel elements considered critical to quality (e.g., defining patient populations, procedures, or endpoints).'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 鼓励尽早与监管机构沟通，尤其是当一项研究出现可能 影响质量的新关键要素（例如：确定患者人群、程序或终点） 时。

instruction:
已知信息：
'A stratified randomization may be needed to account for factors that may significantly influence the primary outcome (e.g. CHADS2 score, study centre, etc).'可被翻译为：对于可显著影响主要结局的因素（例如CHADS2评分，研究中心等）可能需要分层随机。
'Factors on which randomisation has been stratified should be accounted for later in the analysis.'可被翻译为：应当在后续的分析中对分层随机化的因素加以 考虑。
'Subgroup analyses are strongly encouraged according to index event (together with stratified randomization in trials recruiting both types of index VTE, DVT and/or PE, see section 6.1) and are encouraged to illustrate outcome in relation to:'可被翻译为：强烈建议根据指标事件进行亚组分析（连同招募两种类型指标 VTE（DVT 和/或PE）的临床试验中分层随机，见第6.1节）并且鼓励阐明与以下情相关的结局：
'In multicentre trials randomisation might be stratified by centre, country and/or region.'可被翻译为：在多中心试验中，随机化可以根据中心、国家和/或地区进行分层。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Stratified randomisation may be needed to account for factors that may significantly influence the primary outcome (e.g. index DVT or PE, study centre, etc).'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 对于可显著影响主要结局的因素（如指数DVT或PE，研究中心等）可能需要采用分层随机。

instruction:
已知信息：
'E.i.1.2 Reaction / Event as Reported by the Primary Source for Translation'可被翻译为：E.i.1.2主要来源用于翻译报告的反应/事件
'E.i.1.2 Reaction / Event as Reported by the Primary Source for Translation User Guidance This data element captures the original reporter's words and/or short phrases used to describe the reaction/event should be provided in an English translation for international transmission. Conformance Optional Data Type 250AN OID None Value Allowed Free text Business Rule(s)'可被翻译为：E.i.1.2 主要来源用于翻译报告的反应/事件 用户指导原则 可选择 该数据元素获取的原始报告者的词语和元素和（或）短句用于描述应提供用于国际传播的英文翻译的反应/事件。 一致性 数据类型 250AN OID 允许值 无 自定义文本 业务规则
'E.i.1 Reaction / Event as Reported by the Primary Source'可被翻译为：E.i.1主要来源报告的反应/事件
'The information related to the outcome of the reaction(s)/event(s) is noted in E.i.7 - Outcome of Reaction / Event at the Time of Last Observation.'可被翻译为：与反应/事件的结果相关的信息在E.i.7中-在最后一次观察时的反应/事件的结果。

根据上述已知信息，请将'E.i - Reaction(s)/Event(s) (repeat as necessary) 1 ... n E - Reaction(s)/Event(s) E.i.1.1a - Reaction / Event as Reported by the Primary Source in Native Language E.i.1.1b - Reaction / Event as Reported by the Primary Source Language E.i.1.2 - Reaction / Event as Reported by the Primary Source for Translation E.i.2.1a - MedDRA Version for Reaction / Event E.i.2.1b - Reaction / Event (MedDRA code) E.i.3.1 - Term Highlighted by the Reporter E.i.3.2 - Seriousness Criteria at Event Level E.i.3.2a - Results in Death E.i.3.2b - Life Threatening E.i.3.2c - Caused / Prolonged Hospitalisation E.i.3.2d - Disabling / Incapacitating E.i.3.2e - Congenital Anomaly / Birth Defect E.i.3.2f - Other Medically Important Condition E.i.4 - Date of Start of Reaction / Event E.i.5 - Date of End of Reaction / Event E.i.6a - Duration of Reaction / Event E.i.6b - Duration of Reaction / Event (duration unit) E.i.7 - Outcome of Reaction / Event at the Time of Last Observation E.i.8 - Medical Confirmation by Healthcare Professional E.i.9 - Identification of the Country Where the Reaction / Event Occurred'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: E -反应/事件 1„n E.i -反应/事件（必要时重复） E.i.1.1 -主要来源使用母语报告的反应/事件 E.i.1.1b -主要来源语言报告的反应/事件 E.i.1.2 -主要来源用于翻译报告的反应/事件 E.i.2.1a -用于反应/事件的MedDRA版本 E.i.2.1b ––MedDRA术语中的反应/事件编码 E.I.3.1 -由报告者强调的术语 E.i.3.2 -事件层面的严重性标准 E.i.3.2a -导致死亡 E.i.3.2b -危及生命 E.i.3.2c -导致/延长住院 E.i.3.2d –残疾/功能丧失–残疾功能丧失 AESCONG -先天性异常或出生缺陷 E.i.3.2f -其他重要医学事件其他重要医学事件 E.i.4 -反应/事件开始日期 E.i.5 -反应/事件结束日期 E.i.6a -反应/事件持续时间 E.i.6b -反应/事件持续时间（持续时间单位） E.i.7 -末次观察时反应/事件的结果 E.i.8 -医疗保健专业人士的医学确认 E.i.9 -发生反应/事件的国家识别

instruction:
已知信息：
'To strengthen the supervision and guidance over the registration of medical device products and further improve the quality of registration review, NMPA has organized the formulation of and released on March 5, 2020 the Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Colloidal Gold Immunochromatographic Analyzers, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Follicle stimulating Hormone Detection Reagents, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Creatinine Detection Reagents, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Antinuclear Antibody Detection Reagents, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Antithyroid Peroxidase Antibody Assay Reagents, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Glycated Albumin Assay Reagents, and the Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Total Bile Acid Assay Reagents.'可被翻译为：为加强医疗器械产品注册工作的监督和指导，进一步提高注册审查质量，国家药品监督管理局组织制定并于2020年3月5日发布了《胶体金免疫层析分析仪注册技术审查指导原则》《促卵泡生成素检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《肌酐检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《抗核抗体检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《抗甲状腺过氧化物酶抗体测定试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《糖化白蛋白测定试剂注册技术审查指导原则》和《总胆汁酸测定试剂注册技术审查指导原则》。
'To strengthen the supervision and guidance over the registration of medical device products and further improve the quality of registration review, NMPA has organized the formulation of and released on January 18, 2021 the Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Mycoplasma Pneumoniae IgM/IgG Antibody Detection Reagents, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Cryptococcus Capsular Polysaccharide Antigen Detection Reagents, and Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Hereditary Hearing Loss Gene Mutation Detection Reagents.'可被翻译为：为加强医疗器械产品注册工作的监督和指导，进一步提高注册审查质量，国家药品监督管理局组织制定了《肺炎支原体IgM/IgG抗体检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《隐球菌荚膜多糖抗原检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》和《遗传性耳聋相关基因突变检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》，于2021年1月18日予以发布。
'To strengthen the supervision and guidance over the registration of medical device products and further improve the quality of registration review, NMPA has organized the formulation of and released on March 10, 2020 the Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of EB Virus Nucleic Acid Detection Reagents, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of HBV e Antigen, e Antibody Detection Reagents, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Thalassemia-Related Gene Detection Reagents, and Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of HBV-Resistant Gene Mutation Detection Reagents.'可被翻译为：为加强医疗器械产品注册工作的监督和指导，进一步提高注册审查质量，国家药品监督管理局于2020年3月10日组织制定并发布了《EB病毒核酸检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《乙型肝炎病毒e抗原、e抗体检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《地中海贫血相关基因检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《乙型肝炎病毒耐药相关的基因突变检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》。
'To strengthen the supervision and guidance over the registration of medical device products and further improve the quality of registration review, NMPA has organized the formulation of and released on November 15, 2019 the Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Human Chromosome Abnormality Detection Reagents Based on Cytofluorometric In Situ Hybridization, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Multiple Nucleic Acids Detection Reagents for Respiratory Virus, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Nucleic Acid-Based Detection Reagents for Staphylococcus Aureus and Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus Aureus, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Detection Reagents for Chlamydia Trachomatis and / or Neisseria Gonorrhoeae Nucleic Acids, and Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Amino Acid, Carnitine, and Succinyl acetone.'可被翻译为：为加强对医疗器械产品注册工作的监督和指导，进一步提高注册审查质量，国家药品监督管理局组织制定并于2019年11月15日发布了《基于细胞荧光原位杂交法的人类染色体异常检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《呼吸道病毒多重核酸检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《基于核酸检测方法的金黄色葡萄球菌和耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》《沙眼衣原体和/或淋病奈瑟菌核酸检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》和《氨基酸、肉碱及琥珀酰丙酮检测试剂注册技术审查指导原则》。

根据上述已知信息，请将'To strengthen the supervision and guidance over medical device product registration and further improve the quality of registration review, NMPA has organized the formulation of and released on October 29, 2019 the Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Assay Reagents for Aspartate Aminotransferase, Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Total Cholesterol Assay Reagents, Guidelines for the Technical Review of Registration of Uric Acid Determination Reagents, and Guidelines for Technical Review of the Registration of Urea Determination Reagents.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。

'This is typically a cytogenetic assay, and the micronucleus assay in vivo is called for when following up potential for chromosome loss.'可被翻译为：代表性的是一个细胞遗传学试验，而且，当为染色体丢失潜力进行追加试验时要求进行体内微核试验。
'Positive results reported in the mouse lymphoma L5178Y cell tk assay (Ref. 3) are small increases, associated with substantial cytotoxicity, and do not meet the current criteria for a positive assay using the “global evaluation factor” (Ref. 4).'可被翻译为：在小鼠淋巴瘤L5178Y细胞Tk基因突变试验（参考文 献3）中报道的阳性结果是略有增加，这与较高的细胞毒性有关；使用“总体评估因子”（参考文献4）评价认为其结果不符合现行标准而未呈阳性。
'In vivo, glycidol was positive in a mouse micronucleus assay by oral gavage in male and female P16Ink4a/p19Arf haploinsufficient mice.'可被翻译为：环氧丙醇灌胃给予雄性和雌性P16Ink4a / p19Arf 单基因突变的小鼠，体内微核试验结果呈阳性。

instruction:
已知信息：
'With increasing knowledge about the various pathophysiologies of pain, however, other approaches of classifying different pain conditions or target populations might in future come to the fore with the challenge of the development of disease modifying therapies.'可被翻译为：然而，随着关于疼痛的各种病理生理学的知识的增加，分类不同的疼痛病症或目标人群的其他方法可能在未来变得突出，伴随着病情改变治疗的发展的挑战。
'Thus, unless maladaptive characteristics are clearly shown, these pain models are not regarded as appropriate to support a chronic pain indication. Patients with long-standing nociceptive pain without prominent maladaptive features do however form an appropriate patient population for trials to characterise maintenance of efficacy for medicinal products intended primarily for the treatment of acute pain.'可被翻译为：因此，除非明确显示适应不良的特征，否则这些疼痛模型不被认为适合于支持慢性疼痛适应症。 然而，具有长期伤害性疼痛但没有突出的适应不良特征的患者形成适当的患者人群用于试验， 以表征主要用于治疗急性疼痛的药品的有效性维持。
'At present the contribution of nociceptive and neuropathic components in patients with chronic pain is not routinely evaluated in general clinical practice.'可被翻译为：目前，在慢性疼痛患者中伤害性和神经性组分的贡献在一般临床实践中不进行常规评价。
'The following general principles can be stated for the data requirements to support different types of indications in chronic pain:'可被翻译为：对于支持慢性疼痛中不同类型适应症的数据要求，可以规定以下一般原则：

根据上述已知信息，请将'Distinguishing these patients from maladaptive chronic pain, in whom the underlying pathophysiology is different, can be difficult and is currently uncommon in general clinical practice. Recommendations on how to address these challenges are outlined in the following chapters.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 区分这些患者与适应不良的慢性疼痛患者（其中潜在的病理生理学是不同的）可能是 困难的，并且目前在一般的临床实践中是不常见的。 关于如何应对这些挑战的建议在以下章节中概述。

instruction:

'In this document, the blind review (see Glossary) of data refers to the checking of data during the period of time between trial completion (the last observation on the last subject) and the breaking of the blind.'可被翻译为：本文件中，数据的盲态审核（见词汇表）是指在试验完 成（对最后一位受试者的最后一次观察）到揭盲之间的这段 时间内对数据的检查。
'The checking and assessment of data during the period of time between trial completion (the last observation on the last subject) and the breaking of the blind, for the purpose of finalising the planned analysis.'可被翻译为：是指在试验完成（最后一位受试者的最后一次观察）到揭盲这段时间内对数据的检查和评价，旨在最终确定分析计划。
'Particular attention should be paid to any differences between the planned analysis and the actual analysis as described in the protocol, protocol amendments or the updated statistical analysis plan based on a blind review of data.'可被翻译为：应特 别注意在方案、方案修订以及基于数据盲态审核更新的统计 分析计划中所描述的计划分析与实际分析之间的任何差异。
'During the planning phase of a trial the principal features of the analysis should have been specified in the protocol as described in Section 5.'可被翻译为：如第5章节所述，在试验的计划阶段，分析的主要特征 应在方案中确定。

根据上述已知信息，请将'When the conduct of the trial is over and the data are assembled and available for preliminary inspection, it is valuable to carry out the blind review of the planned analysis also described in Section 5.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 当试验结束而且数据经整理可供初步检查 时，如第5章节提到的按计划进行盲态审核是有价值的。

'For this purpose, the investigators have to collect data regarding symptoms duration.'可被翻译为：为此，研究者需收集症状持续时间 的数据。
'Study observations should use timing and methodology similar to those used in the control patients.'可被翻译为：研究观查 在时间选择和方法学上应与在对照病例中使用的相似。
'Patients displaying “alarm symptoms” additionally to the “typical” GORD symptoms may be included based on endoscopic exclusion of malignancy.'可被翻译为：除有“典型”GORD 症状外 还表现出 “警示症状 ”的患者则应接受内窥镜检查排除恶性肿瘤后方可入选。
'In this document, the former case is referred to as an interventional study and the latter case is referred to as an observational study.'可被翻译为：在本文件中，前一种情况称为干预性研究，后一种情况称为观察性研究。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Typical symptoms can be quantified during an 8-24 hour observational study.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 在一项为时 8 到 24 小时的观察性研究中可以对典型症状进行量化。

instruction:

'In a mixture of two enantiomers (El and E2), where the amount of E1 is assumed to be greater than E2, the percentage of enantiomer E1 excess is called the enantiomer excess of E1.'可被翻译为：在两个对映体（El和E2）的混合物中，假定E1的量大于E2,则对映体E1过量的百分数称为E1的对映体过量。
'http://www.ema.europa.eu/ema/index.jsp?curl=pages/regulation/document_listing/document_listing_ 000319.jsp&mid=WC0b01ac0580022bb0.'可被翻译为：http://www.ema.europa.eu/ema/index.jsp?curl=pages/regulation/document_listing/do cument_listing_000319.jsp&mid=WC0b01ac0580022bb0.
'If the drug substance is a racemate or some other mixture of enantiomers, additional justification should be made for the choice of the analyte [racemate or enantiomer(s)].'可被翻译为：如果药物是消旋体或对映异构体的混合物，应对分析物（消旋体或对映异构体）的选择进行附加说明。

根据上述已知信息，请将'The ratio of the specific curl of a sample containing an enantiomer mixture to the specific curl of a pure mono-isomer.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 含有对映体混合物的样品比旋度与纯单-异构体的比旋度的比值。

instruction:
已知信息：
'A substance of established quality and purity, as shown by comparison to a primary reference standard, used as a reference standard for routine laboratory analysis.'可被翻译为：经与标准品/对照品比对，符合质量和纯度要求的物质，供实验室日常分析使用。
'Reference Standard: A well-characterised substance of known purity and identity used to prepare calibration and quality control samples.'可被翻译为：对照标准品：用于制备校正标样和质控样品的具有已知纯度和特性的物质。
'The characteristic quantity value of the standard substance shall be measured by accurate and reliable method or by method directly compared with the first class standard substance, and the standard substance whose measurement accuracy meets the needs shall be measured. In the laboratory, it usually refers to the working reference material (standard material) used as a control after comparison with the primary reference material.'可被翻译为：采用准确、可靠的方法或直接与一级标准物质相比较的方法，测量标准物质的特性量值，测量准确度满足需要的标准物质。在实验室中通常是指与一级标准物质比对后作为对照使用的工作对照品（标准品）。
'It is important that the reference standard is well characterised and the quality (e.g., purity, identity) of the reference standard and the suitability of the IS is ensured, as the quality will affect the outcome of the analysis and, therefore, the study data. The reference standard used during validation and study sample analysis should be obtained from an authentic and traceable source. The reference standard should be identical to the analyte. If this is not possible, an established form (e.g., salt or hydrate) of known quality should be used.'可被翻译为：对照标准品具有良好性质至关重要，其质量会影响分析结果，从而影响研究数据，因此要确保其质量（纯度、鉴别）和内标的适用性。方法验证和研究样品分析过程中使用的对照标准品的来源应可靠并可追溯，并且其化学形式应与待测物相同。如果无法获得与待测物相同的对照标准品，也可以使用质量可控的其他化学形式的物质（例如盐或水合物）。

根据上述已知信息，请将'A substance of established quality and purity, as shown by comparison to a primary reference standard, used as a reference standard for routine laboratory analysis.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 通过与一级标准品的比对表明具有确定的质量和纯度的物质，作为日常实验室分析的标准品之用。

instruction:

instruction:
已知信息：
'8 We recognize that treatment guidelines suggest a stratification of patients in which those with more severe ABECB-COPD should receive treatment with an antibacterial drug. A reliable and well-defined magnitude of the treatment effect for patients with more severe ABECB-COPD has not been established.'可被翻译为：8 我们认识到治疗指导方针建议对患者进行分层，而其中ABECB-COPD更加严重的患者应接受抗菌药物治疗。尚未对ABECB-COPD更加严重的患者确定可靠且定义良好的治疗作用。
'Since these public discussions were held, publications of reviews and treatment guidelines of ABECB-COPD have suggested a stratified approach in which antibacterial drugs are recommended for patients with ABECB-COPD characterized as moderate or severe, but not for patients with ABECB-COPD characterized as mild. This guidance discusses the trial design issues listed above as well as a different stratification for ABECB-COPD based on inpatient versus outpatient treatment (see Appendix A).'可被翻译为：自这些公共讨论举办以来，审查的出版物与ABECB-COPD治疗指导方针建议采用分层的方式推荐中度或重度ABECB-COPD患者使用抗菌药物，而对轻度患者不建议使用。该指南讨论了上述的试验设计问题和基于住院患者与门诊患者 治疗的不同ABECB-COPD分层（见附件A）。
'·Patient history and characteristics. The following patient demographic characteristics should be used for a better chance of selecting patients more likely to have ABECB- COPD:'可被翻译为：患者病史与特征。应采用以下患者人口统计学特征提高ABECB-COPD 患者的选择机率：
'The diagnosis of an acute exacerbation presents additional concerns. A diagnosis of ABECB- COPD reflects a change in patient symptoms from their usual baseline; for a trial to demonstrate efficacy of antimicrobial therapy to be effective, patients who have a true change in symptoms should be selected. Because symptoms and signs as reported by the patient are critical to the diagnosis and clinical management of COPD and ABECB-COPD, a well-defined and reliable patient-reported outcome (PRO) instrument should be used in clinical trials for the treatment of ABECB-COPD.9'可被翻译为：急性加重的诊断本身存在着其他问题。ABECB-COPD的诊断反映了患者症状较之于其基线的变化；对于证明抗菌治疗有效的试验而言，应选择症状发生真 实改变的患者。根据患者报告的症状和体征对诊断和临床管理COPD和ABECB-COPD至关重要，因此应在治疗ABECB-COPD的临床试验中使用一种定义良好且可靠的患者报告结局（PRO）的量表。9

根据上述已知信息，请将'Antimicrobials with clinically significant toxicity may not be appropriate for study of ABECB- COPD unless the treatment goal is directed at a more seriously ill patient portion of the ABECB- COPD population.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 具有临床显著毒性的抗菌药可能不适合研究ABECB-COPD，除非治疗目标是针对ABECB-COPD人群中病情更加严重的患者。

instruction:

'Endogenous insulin can usually be sufficiently suppressed by clamping blood glucose levels below the subject’s fasting glucose (see below).'可被翻译为：受试者空腹血糖以下的钳夹血糖水平一般能抑制内源性胰岛素（如下）。

'Methods for suppressing endogenous insulin or adjusting measured insulin serum concentrations for estimated endogenous insulin may be considered (see below).'可被翻译为：可以考虑采取抑制内源性胰岛素或者为其调整胰岛素血清浓度测量值的方法（见下）。

根据上述已知信息，请将'For evaluation of prandial insulins, the insulin bolus is expected to adequately suppress endogenous insulin for the duration of the clamp.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 为了评估餐前胰岛素，在钳夹过程中胰岛素剂量应足够压制内源性胰岛素。

instruction:

'Value Allowed Free text Business Rule(s) ACK.B.r.3 ICSR Message ACK Receiver User Guidance This data element identifies the organisation that submitted the ICH ICSR message (creator of ICH ICSR message).'可被翻译为：ICH ICSR执行指导原则 2016年11月10日 -150- 允许值 自定义文本 业务规则 ACK.B.r.3 ICSR消息R消息ACK接收者 用户指导原则 该数据元素标识提交ICH ICSR消息的机构（ICH ICSR消息的创建者）。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Often there are retrospective genomic analyses in many studies and clinical trials.'可被翻译为：许多研究和临床试验中也开展了回顾性基因组分析。
'The questions to be addressed in the studies may relate to the identification and/or characterisation of genomic BMs, and their impact on patient selection, dose selection, and choice of concomitant medications.'可被翻译为：研究中要解决的问题可涉及基因组学BM的识别和/或表征，以及它们对患者选择、剂量选择和伴 随药物选择的影响。
'Studies evaluated to define the predictive values of the genomic biomarker included both retrospective case-control studies and prospective clinical trials. Carriers of the HLA-B*5701 allele are at significantly increased risk of serious hypersensitivity reactions when exposed to the anti-retroviral agent abacavir (Mallal et al 2008).'可被翻译为：评估和确定基因组学生物标记物预测值的研究主要包括回顾性病例对照试验 和前瞻性临床试验。 HLA-B*5701等位基因携带者暴露于抗逆转录药物阿巴卡韦时，其严重过敏反应的 发生风险显著增加(Mallal et al 2008)。
'Major types of these designs are cross- sectional studies, case-control studies, and cohort studies (both retrospective and prospective)12,15.'可被翻译为：这些设计的主要类型是横断面研究，病例对照研究 和队列研究（回顾性的和前瞻性的） [12,15] 。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Studies demonstrating the predictive values of the genomic BM included both retrospective case- control studies and prospective clinical trials.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 例子包括HLA等位基因和与阿巴卡韦、卡马西平和别嘌呤醇的特异性反应。

instruction:
已知信息：
'The properties listed in items below can lead to changes in the behavior of the liposome drug product, including leakage of the drug from the liposomes.'可被翻译为：下面所列举的特性能导致脂质体药品表现的改变，包括药物成分的泄漏。
'The physical stability of liposome drug products can be affected by a number of factors (e.g., the liposome integrity, the size distribution of the lipid vesicles, unsaturation of the fatty acid groups). Some liposomes are susceptible to fusion (i.e., irreversible coalition of smaller liposomes to form larger liposomes), aggregation (i.e., reversible conglomeration or pooling of two or more liposomes without fusion), and leakage of the contained drug substance during storage.'可被翻译为：脂质体药品的物理稳定性可受多个因素影响（如，脂质体的完整性，脂质囊泡的粒度分布，脂肪酸的不饱和度）。某些脂质体容易聚合（即较小的脂质体不可逆地聚集成较大的脂质体）、聚集（即两个或两个以上的脂质体可逆地非聚合性结团或淤积）和包载药物在存储中泄漏。
'Stability testing should include tests to assess liposome size distribution and integrity. You should evaluate the chemical stability of the lipid components in the liposome as well as the chemical stability of the contained drug substance.'可被翻译为：稳定性试验应纳入脂质体的粒度分布和完整性测试。应当同时研究脂质体中脂质成分的稳定性和所包载药物的稳定性。
'For example, drug encapsulation efficiency (defined as percentage of drug contained inside liposomes compared with total amount of drug) and liposome drug loading (defined as the percentage of drug contained which is then compared with the amount of the lipid used, which is the drug-to-128 lipid ratio).'可被翻译为：例如，药物包封率（定义为包封在脂质体内部的药量与总药量的比值）和脂 质体载药率（定义为含药量与脂质量的百分比，也就是药物-脂质的比例）。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Fusion, aggregation, or leakage can be affected by the lipid components in the liposome or by the contained drug substance.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 聚集、聚合和泄漏都可能受脂质成 分或包载药物的影响。

instruction:
已知信息：
'It is crucial to have identical diagnostic procedures between active and placebo groups in order to avoid sampling bias. Additionally, long observation periods are needed as both the induction period and the latency period to detect a prostate cancer are long. Even small differences in management between the treatment groups may harbour confounding factors of importance.'可被翻译为：为了避免样本引起的偏倚，活性治疗组与安慰剂组之间的诊断程序相同至关重要。此外，需要较长的观察期，因为能检测出前列腺癌的诱导期和潜伏期都很长。即使治疗组之间的管理的微小差异也可能是重要的混杂因素。
'There is thus a risk related to the detection of indolent tumours and a challenge to identify clinical significant prostate cancer of importance to treat.'可被翻译为：因此，存在一定的风险去检测这种无痛性肿瘤，发现临床重大的前列腺癌比治疗更具有挑战性。
'A longer period might be needed for induction of complete renal remission, i.e. 1 year.'可被翻译为：诱导治疗是否获得完全缓解则需要更长的时间，即一年。
'Prostate cancer is diagnosed on histopathology of core biopsies, but the likelihood to detect a cancer is dependent on number of biopsies, the prostate volume and the cancer location (anterior cancer and cancer located near the urethra is difficult to biopsy using transrectal technique).'可被翻译为：通过核心活检样本的组织病理学结果可以诊断前列腺癌，但是能否检测到癌症的可能性依赖于活检样本的数量、前列腺的体积以及癌症位置（位置靠前的癌症和靠近尿道的癌症很难通过经直肠技术取得活检样本）。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Additionally, long observation periods are needed as both the induction period and the latency period to detect a prostate cancer are long.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 此外，需要较长的观察期，因为能检测出前列腺癌的诱导期和潜伏期都很长。

instruction:
已知信息：
'In the process of the review and approval of a new drug, the registration classification and technical requirements thereof shall not be changed, even though the preparations of the same active ingredients applied for by domestic manufacturers are approved for marketing in China.'可被翻译为：在新药审批期间，其注册分类和技术要求不因国内药品生产企业申报的相同活性成份的制剂在我国获准上市而发生变化。
'(1) Drugs with the same active ingredients, indications, dosage forms and strengths as non-prescription drugs that have been marketed within the territory of the People's Republic of China;'可被翻译为：（一）境内已有相同活性成分、适应症（或者功能主治）、剂型、规格的非处方药上市的药品；
'(3) The review timeline for independent applications of generic products of domestically marketed chemical active drug ingredients is 200 days.'可被翻译为：（三）单独申报仿制境内已上市化学原料药的审评时限为二百日；
'(2) For rare disease drugs with urgent clinical needs that have been marketed overseas but not marketed within the territory of the People’s Republic of China, the review timeline is 70 days;'可被翻译为：（二）临床急需的境外已上市境内未上市的罕见病药品，审评时限为七十日；

根据上述已知信息，请将'For the generic chemical active drug ingredients already used in marketed drug products within the territory of the People’s Republic of China, separated review and approval may be applied.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 仿制境内已上市药品所用的化学原料药的，可以申请单独审评审批。

instruction:
已知信息：
'The need for statistical adjustment because of such analyses should be addressed.'可被翻译为：应该说明由于这种分析而进行统计调整的需要。
'Pre-trial deliberations should identify those covariates and factors expected to have an important influence on the primary variable(s), and should consider how to account for these in the analysis in order to improve precision and to compensate for any lack of balance between treatment groups.'可被翻译为：应通过试验前的缜密考虑，确定这些协变量以及 预期对主要指标有重要影响的因素，并考虑在分析中如何处 理，以提高精度和补偿处理组之间的任何不平衡。
'A diagram showing the relationship between the entire sample and any other analysis groups should be provided.'可被翻译为：应提供一个描述总体样品与其他分析组之间关系的图 表。
'A description should be given of any intentions to use baseline data to improve precision or to adjust estimates for potential baseline differences, for example by means of analysis of covariance.'可被翻译为：应当说明使用 基线数据以提高精度或以潜在基线差异校正估计值的任何 意图，例如，使用协方差分析进行校正。

根据上述已知信息，请将'and to specify ‘how to account for them in the analysis in order to improve precision and to compensate for any lack of balance between groups’.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 并说明“如何在分析中对其进行解释以提高精度、弥补组间不平衡的情况”。

instruction:
已知信息：
'The combined use of the active substances should improve the benefit/risk by either increasing or adding therapeutic efficacy, or by improving safety with the FDC in comparison to the use of the single active substance.'可被翻译为：相对于单用活性物质而言，应通过增强或增加疗效或者通过改善FDC的安全性来提高联用活性物质的获益/风险。
'Justification of the pharmacological and medical rationale for the combination.'可被翻译为：复方制剂的药理学和医学基本原理的正当性。
'Analytical performance criteria should be defined and justified in a pragmatic way so as to be proportionate to the stage of development and to risks and benefits of its intended use ("fit-for-purpose").'可被翻译为：不同研发阶段都应指定明确的判定标准，且与预定用途的收益与风险比相适应（目的导向）。
'When two substrates are present in the cell at the same time, the readily available substrate and its decomposition products inhibit the synthesis of enzymes that are not readily available.'可被翻译为：细胞内同时存在两种底物时，易利用底物及其分解产物会阻遏难利用底物分解酶系合成的过程。

根据上述已知信息，请将'It should be justified that the benefits of starting two drugs at the same time outweighs its disadvantages (unnecessary treatment, safety issues).'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 同时开始使用两种药物的优点大于其缺点（不必要的治疗、安全问题）应该是合理的。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Adequate PK comparisons between subpopulations known to be associated with differences in PK will allow for decisions with respect to the need for pharmacodynamic studies and dose-response studies in different regions and/or subpop- ulations.'可被翻译为：在已知有PK差异的 亚群中进行充分的PK比较，将有助于确定是否需要在不同区域和/ 或亚群实施药效动力学研究与剂量-反应关系研究。
'On occasion there may be need for specific studies in these older groups including PK and dose Guideline on response.'可被翻译为：有时可能需要在这些老年人群中进行特殊研究，包括PK和剂量反应。
'MRCTs conducted according to the present guideline will allow investigation of treat- ment effects including safety evaluations in the overall population as well as investiga- tions of the potential impact of intrinsic and extrinsic factors (described as ethnic factors in the ICH E5 guideline) on the treatment effect.'可被翻译为：根据本指导原则实施的MRCT可用于研究处理效应，包括对总 人群进行安全性评价，以及研究内在和外在因素（在ICH E5指导原 则中描述为种族因素）对处理效应的潜在影响。
'Studies to evaluate the effects of intrinsic (such as renal impairment and hepatic impairment) and extrinsic (such as food effect and drug interactions) factors on pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics, and exposure-response could be conducted either with the individual drugs or the combination.'可被翻译为：可对单个药物或联合治疗开展研究以评估内在（如肾损害和肝损害）和外在（如食物影响和药 物相互作用）因素对药代动力学、药效学和暴露-效应的影响。

根据上述已知信息，请将'These could include a PK-PD or dose-response study conducted in a particular ethnic population or studies conducted for a broader population, that would allow further evaluation of the impact of intrinsic and extrinsic factors on dose-response.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 其中可包括在某一特定种族人群 或更广泛人群中的PK-PD或剂量-反应关系研究，这有助于进一步 评估内在和外在因素对剂量-反应关系的影响。

instruction:
已知信息：
'A trial using any of the control types may demonstrate efficacy of the test treatment by showing that it is superior to the control (placebo, no treatment, low dose of test drug, active drug).'可被翻译为：采用任何类型对照的研究，可能通过显示试验治疗优于 对照(安慰剂、无治疗对照、低剂量试验药物、活性药物)来证明试验治疗的有效性。
'When a new treatment shows an advantage over an active control, the study is readily interpreted as showing efficacy, just as any other superiority trial is, assuming that the active control is not actually harmful.'可被翻译为：当一个新治疗显示其优于活性对照，且假设活性对照确 实无害时，该研究就可以像其他优效性试验一样，推断出新 治疗的有效性。
'• Active control seeking to show superiority of test drug to active control (see 2.4)'可被翻译为：活性对照，目的在于表明实验药物比活性 对照优效（见2.4）
'Where superiority to an active treatment is shown, active control studies are readily interpretable regarding evidence of efficacy.'可被翻译为：当活性对照研究显示出试验治疗优效于活性治疗时，更 易于解读为有效性的证据。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Such a result, however -- superiority in the trial of the test agent to the control -- is interpretable as true superiority of the test treatment to the control treatment only when the active control is used in appropriate patients at an appropriate dose and schedule (see section 1.4.3).'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 然而，试验中试验药物所表 现的相对于对照药物的优效性，只有当活性对照药物在最佳 的给药剂量和给药方案下、用于合适的病人时才能判断为真 正的优效(见1.4.3)。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Depending on the nature of information available at the time of writing, the MAH may be able to use information across multiple documents.'可被翻译为：根据撰写时可获得的信息的性质，MAH或许能使用多个文档中的信息。
'If a report is submitted to multiple INDs, each IND safety report should identify all INDs to which the report is submitted.'可被翻译为：如果一个报告被提交给多个IND，则每个IND安全性报告都应说明报告提交的所有IND。
'4. Other IND Submissions Where there is a combination IND and INDs for one or more individual drugs, sponsors should consider whether the information in a planned IND submission is relevant to only one IND or to multiple INDs.'可被翻译为：4. 其他IND提交 。当已有联合治疗IND和一种或多种单一药物IND时，申办方应考虑在计划 IND提交中的信息是否仅与一个IND或与多个IND相关。
'If a reportable adverse event occurs in a study of one of the individual drugs in the combination, the report should be submitted to the IND for that individual drug and to the IND for the combination.'可被翻译为：如果在联合治疗其中一种药物的研究中发生了可报告的不良事件，则该报告应提交给该单 个药物的IND及联合治疗的IND。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Where information is relevant to more than one IND, the information can be submitted in its entirety to each IND or can be submitted to one IND and cross-referenced in the other INDs.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 若信息与多个IND相关，可将信息全部提交给每个IND或可提交给一个IND而在其他IND中交叉参照。

instruction:

instruction:
已知信息：
'Each year, sponsors and FDA engage in thousands of formal and informal communications, including meetings and teleconferences, during the IND phase of drug development. Because these communications are often opportunities to share information and provide critical advice  (e.g., trial design, dose selection, nonclinical study requirements, manufacturing and facility issues), it is important that interactions be conducted efficiently and consistently, with clear, concise, and timely communication.'可被翻译为：在药物开发的IND阶段，申办方和FDA每年都会进行成千上万次正式和非正式沟通，包括会议和电话会议。因为这些沟通往往是分享信息和提供关键建议（例如，试验设计、剂量选择、非临床研究的要求、生产和设备问题）的时机，因此进行有效且一致的相互交流以及清晰、简明且及时的沟通至关重要。
'Effective and timely communication between FDA and sponsors promotes understanding of mutual goals and is invaluable to the drug development process. Central to this is the ability to communicate clearly, both orally and in writing, inside and outside the formal meeting format.'可被翻译为：FDA和申办方之间的有效且及时的沟通可促进对相互目标的理解，对药物的开发过程至关重要。这一点的核心是能够在正式会议内外以口头和书面形式进行清楚地沟通。
'‒ Sponsors are encouraged to request feedback via formal meetings with FDA at the major drug development milestones described above.'可被翻译为：- 鼓励申办方在上述重大药物开发里程碑时经由正式会议向FDA请求反馈。
'Feedback to sponsors via the formal meeting process is provided in three main formats: face-to-face meetings, teleconferences, and WRO responses.'可被翻译为：通过正式会议流程向申办方提供的反馈包括三种主要形式：面对面会议、电 话会议和WRO回复。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Communications that involve sharing results and information at critical milestones during drug development or are necessary for a stalled development program to proceed are best addressed in formal meetings between FDA and sponsors (e.g., face-to-face meeting, teleconference, or written response only (WRO)). Timelines for FDA sending feedback to sponsors via the formal meeting process are described in Prescription Drug User Fee Act (PDUFA) and Biosimilar User Fee Act (BsUFA) agreements and in FDA’s formal meetings guidances.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 涉及在药物开发期间在关键里程碑分享结果和信息的沟通或者终止开发计划所需进行的沟通最好在FDA与申办方之间的正式会议（例如，面对面会议、电话会议或仅书面答复（WRO））中进行。FDA通过正式会议流程向申办方发送反馈时间限详见处方药用户付费法案（PDUFA）和生物仿制药用户付费法案（BsUFA）协议以及FDA的正式会议指导原则。

instruction:
已知信息：
'The applicant or filing entity may conduct product research and development with reference to the relevant technical guidelines, and may also adopt different test methods or technical means while it is required to describe their reasonableness.'可被翻译为：申请人或者备案人可以参考相关技术指导原则进行产品研制，也可以采用不同的实验方法或者技术手段，但应当说明其合理性。
'The applicant may elect to use proven acceptable ranges or design space for different aspects of the manufacturing process.'可被翻译为：申请人可以根据生产工艺的各种不同情况，选择采用已 证明的可接受的控制范围的方式，或者设计空间的方式。
'Risk Assessment: Linking Material Attributes and Process Parameters to Drug Product CQAs'可被翻译为：风险评估：联接物料特性及工艺参数与药品CQA
'2.3 Risk Assessment: Linking Material Attributes and Process Parameters to Drug Product CQAs'可被翻译为：2.3 风险评估：联接物料特性及工艺参数与药品CQA

根据上述已知信息，请将'No, the applicant will need to justify the choice of material attributes and parameters for multivariate experimentation based on risk assessment and desired operational flexibility.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 没有必要，申请者需要根据风险评估和所设计的操作灵 活性，确证选择哪些物料属性和工艺参数进行多变量试验。

instruction:
已知信息：
'3T3 NRU-PT: In vitro 3T3 Neutral Red Uptake Phototoxicity Test.'可被翻译为：3T3 NRU-PT：体外3T3中性红摄取光毒性试验。
'In vitro 3T3 Neutral Red Uptake Phototoxicity Test.'可被翻译为：体外3T3中性红摄取光毒性试验。
'If the drug developer chooses an in vitro approach, the 3T3 NRU-PT is currently the most widely used assay and in many cases could be considered as an initial test for phototoxicity.'可被翻译为：如果药物研发者选择一种体外方法，则3T3 NRU-PT是目前应用最广泛的试验，而且在很多情况下用于 光毒性的初步检测。
'Note 4 A survey of pharmaceutical companies indicated that the 3T3 NRU-PT, as described in Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development, Test Guideline (OECD TG) 432, generates a high percentage of positive results (approximately 50%), the majority of which do not correlate with phototoxicity responses in animals or humans (Ref. 9).'可被翻译为：注释4．如OECD TG432所述，制药公司的一项调查显 示3T3 NRU-PT试验中产生了高比例的阳性结果（约50％），其中大部分与动物或人体光毒性反应无关（参考文献9）。

根据上述已知信息，请将'The most widely used in vitro assay for phototoxicity is the 3T3 Neutral Red Uptake Phototoxicity Test (3T3 NRU-PT) for which an Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) guideline (Ref. 6) is available. This is currently considered the most appropriate in vitro screen for soluble compounds.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 应用最广泛的体外试验是3T3中性红摄取光毒性试验 （3T3 NRU-PT），参见经济合作与发展组织（OECD）指导原则（参考文献6），目前认为是可溶性化合物最合适的体外筛选方法。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Modifications to a fully validated analytical method may be evaluated by partial validation. Partial validation can range from as little as one accuracy an d precision determination to a nearly full validation (Refer to Section 6.1). The items in a partial validation should be determined according to the extent and nature of the changes made to the method.'可被翻译为：对经完整验证的分析方法的修改可以通过部分验证进行评估。部分验证的内容应根据方法变更的范围和性质来确定，验证内容可从仅一项准确度和精密度验证到几乎完整验证（参见第6.1节）。
'At least 2 QC levels should fall within the range of concentrations measured in study samples. If the calibration curve range is changed, the bioanalytical method should be revalidated (partial validation) to verify the response function and to ensure accuracy and precision.'可被翻译为：至少2个质控样品浓度水平应在研究样品的浓度范围内。如果校准曲线范围被调整，则应重新验证生物分析方法（部分验证），以验证响应函数并确保准确度和精密度。
'The parameters of the partial validations should meet the full validation criteria. If these criteria are not satisfied, additional investigation and validation is warranted.'可被翻译为：如果检测到的参数满足完整验证标准，则部分验证可以被接受。如果不满足这些标准，则需要额外的调查和验证。
'This can be documented either as a partial validation or as a note to the bioanalytical report.'可被翻译为：上述可作为部分验证 或作为生物分析报告的注释加以记录。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Partial validations evaluate modifications to already fully validated bioanalytical methods. Partial validation can range from as little as one within-run accuracy and precision determination, to a nearly full validation. If stability is established at one facility it does not necessarily need to be repeated at another facility.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 部分验证旨在评价对已经完整验证的生物分析方法的修改。部分验证的范围可由少至一个批内准确度和精密度的测定，到接近于完整验证。如果在一个场所建立了稳定性，则不必在另一个场所重复验证。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Guideline on the evaluation of anticancer medicinal products in man - EMA/CHMP/205/95/Rev.'可被翻译为：人类中的抗癌药品评价指导原则-EMA/CHMP/205/95/Rev.
'Guideline on the evaluation of anticancer medicinal products in man (CHMP/EWP/205/95)'可被翻译为：人用抗癌药品评价指南（CHMP/ EWP/ 205/95）
'DFS is considered to be an appropriate primary endpoint in adjuvant studies (EMA/CHMP/205/95/Rev.4).'可被翻译为：DFS 在辅助治疗研究中被认为是一个适当的主要终点（EMA/CHMP/205/95/Rev.4）。
'Guideline on the evaluation of anticancer medicinal  products in man'可被翻译为：人体抗癌药物评价指南

根据上述已知信息，请将'Guideline on the evaluation of anticancer medicinal products in man - EMA/CHMP/205/95/Rev.4'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 人体抗癌药品的评估指南 - EMA /CHMP /205/95 / 修订4

instruction:
已知信息：
'In general, a parallel group design that includes the test drug at one or more doses, and one or more control treatments (placebo and/or active comparator) is appropriate although the use of other study designs may be acceptable depending on the objective of the trial.'可被翻译为：一般来说,虽然还可以采用其他研究设计，但平行分组试验可能更合适试验 目的要求。平行分组试验设计中会考查药物的一个或多个剂量,同时还有一个或 多个对照治疗(安慰剂和/或活性药物对照)。
'Choice of comparator (monotherapy trials) In general a randomised controlled parallel group trial is the most appropriate design for confirmatory evidence of efficacy in pain trials.'可被翻译为：对照药物的选择（单药治疗试验）一般来说，随机对照平行组试验是疼痛试验中有效性的确证性证据最合适的设计。
'In general a randomised controlled parallel group trial is the most appropriate design for confirmatory evidence of efficacy in pain trials.'可被翻译为：一般来说，随机对照平行组试验是疼痛试验中有效性的确证性证据最合适的设计。
'Short term confirmatory efficacy trials  The preferred design for demonstrating short-term efficacy is a randomised, double-blind, parallel group trial.'可被翻译为：短期验证性有效性试验 用于证明短期有效性的首选设计是随机、双盲、平行组试验。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Parallel group design In situations where extrapolation of efficacy is not possible, the parallel group design provides the most robust evidence for efficacy and safety and is the preferred design.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 平行组设计 在不可能进行疗效外推的情况下，平行组设计提供了最可靠的有效性和安全性证据。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Following completion of the clinical investigation, the IRB must find and document that sufficient information, including the demographic characteristics of the research population and the study results, will be disclosed to the community(ies) and to other researchers (21 CFR 50.24(a)(7)(iii)).'可被翻译为：临床研究完成后，IRB必须确认并且用文件证明，向社区和其他研究者披露 了充分信息，包括该研究人群的人口统计学特征和研究结果（21 CFR 50.24（a） （7）（iii））。
'(iii) Public disclosure of sufficient information following completion of the clinical investigation to apprise the community and researchers of the study, including the demographic characteristics of the research population, and its results;'可被翻译为：iii. 该项研究完成后，必须向该研究的社区和其他研究者披露充分的信 息，包括该研究人群的人口统计学特征及其结果；
'Following completion of the study, the sponsor prepares information to apprise researchers and the community(ies) about the study, including demographic characteristics of the research population, and the study’s results (21 CFR 50.24(a)(7)(iii)).'可被翻译为：研究完成后，申办方准备信息，评估研究者和这项研究的社区，包括研究人 群的人口统计学特征和研究结果（21 CFR 50.24（a）（7）（iii））。
'The goal of public disclosure after the study is completed is to ensure that the communities, the public, and scientific researchers are aware of the study’s results.'可被翻译为：研究完成后公开披露的目标是确保社区、公众和科学研究者知道到该项研究 的结果。

根据上述已知信息，请将'After the study is completed, the IRB reviews the plans for disclosure of sufficient information to apprise the community and researchers of the study, including the demographic characteristics of the research population and its results.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 在研究完成后，IRB会审评将充足信息告知给社区和研究者的公开披露计划， 包括研究人群的人口统计学特征及其结果。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Double blind, parallel group, randomised trial design is recommended.'可被翻译为：建议选择双盲、平行组、随机试验设计。
'Confirmatory trials: Design The most appropriate design for confirmatory trials is considered to be a prospective, double-blind randomized, controlled, parallel group clinical trial.'可被翻译为：验证性试验： 设计认为最适用的验证试验设计为前瞻性、双盲、随机、对照、平行组临床试验。
'Randomised, parallel group, double-blind design is recommended.'可被翻译为：推荐使用随机、平行组、双盲的设计。
'Placebo controlled, randomised, double blind and parallel group design is recommended.'可被翻译为：建议采用安慰剂对照、随机、双盲、平行组设计。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Design For confirmatory trials a prospective, double-blind randomised, controlled, parallel group clinical trial is recommended.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 设计建议验证性试验采用双盲、随机、对照、平行的临床试验。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Article 48 Production areas should be effectively ventilated, with air control facilities (including temperature, humidity and filtration) appropriate to the products handled, the operations undertaken within them and the external environment, to ensure that the production environment is in accordance with the requirements.'可被翻译为：第四十八条 应当根据药品品种、生产操作要求及外部环境状况等配置空调净化系统，使生产区有效通风，并有温度、湿度控制和空气净化过滤，保证药品的生产环境符合要求。
'Article 42: Lighting, temperature, humidity and ventilation should be appropriate and such that they do not adversely affect, directly or indirectly, either the product quality during their manufacture and storage, or the accurate functioning of equipment.'可被翻译为：第四十二条 厂房应当有适当的照明、温度、湿度和通风， 确保生产和贮存的产品质量以及相关设备性能不会直接或间接 地受到影响。
'Provide assurance that cleanrooms and clean air equipment continue to provide an environment of appropriate air cleanliness, in accordance with design and regulatory requirements.'可被翻译为：根据设计和法规要求，保证洁净室和洁净空气设备持续提供适当空气洁净度的环境。
'production environment'可被翻译为：生产环境

根据上述已知信息，请将'Article 48: Production areas should be effectively ventilated, with air control facilities (including temperature, humidity and filtration) appropriate to the products handled, the operations undertaken within them and the external environment, to ensure that the production environment is in accordance with the requirements.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 第四十八条 应当根据药品品种、生产操作要求及外部环境 状况等配置空调净化系统，使生产区有效通风，并有温度、湿度 控制和空气净化过滤，保证药品的生产环境符合要求。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Article 71 The design, selection, installation, adaption and maintenance of equipment should be suitable for its intended use, minimize the risk of contamination, cross-contamination, mixups or errors, and facilitate operation, cleaning, maintenance, as well as disinfection or sterilization if necessary.'可被翻译为：第七十一条 设备的设计、选型、安装、改造和维护必须符合预定用途，应当尽可能降低产生污染、交叉污染、混淆和差错的风险，便于操作、清洁、维护，以及必要时进行的消毒或灭菌。
'Article 71: The design, selection, installation, adaption and maintenance of equipment should be suitable for its intended use, minimize the risk of contamination, cross-contamination, mixups or errors, and facilitate operation, cleaning, maintenance, as well as disinfection or sterilization if necessary.'可被翻译为：第七十一条 设备的设计、选型、安装、改造和维护必须符 合预定用途，应当尽可能降低产生污染、交叉污染、混淆和差错 的风险，便于操作、清洁、维护，以及必要时进行的消毒或灭菌。
'Where unplanned maintenance of equipment critical to the sterility of the product is to be carried out, an assessment of the potential impact to the sterility of the product should be performed and recorded.'可被翻译为：当要进行对产品无菌性至关重要的设备计划外维护时，应评估并记录对产品无菌性的潜在影响。
'Article 72: Procedures for the use, cleaning, maintenance and repair of the equipment should be established, and their operation records should be retained.'可被翻译为：第七十二条 应当建立设备使用、清洁、维护和维修的操作 规程，并保存相应的操作记录。

根据上述已知信息，请将'As far as practicable, equipment, fittings and services should be designed and installed so that operations, maintenance, and repairs can be performed outside the cleanroom. If maintenance has to be performed in the cleanroom, and the required standards of cleanliness and/or asepsis cannot be maintained, then precautions such as restricting access to the work area to specified personnel, generation of clearly defined work protocols and maintenance procedures should be considered. Additional cleaning, disinfection and environmental monitoring should also be considered. If sterilisation of equipment is required, it should be carried out, wherever possible, after complete reassembly.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 设备及辅助装置和服务的设计和安装方式，应尽可能地使操作、维护和维修在洁净室外进行。如果必须在洁净室中进行维护，并且无法维持所要求的洁净和/或无菌标准，则应当考虑预防措施，例如限制指定人员进入工作区，建立明确的工作方案和维护程序。还应考虑额外的清洁、消毒和环境监测。如果需要对设备进行灭菌，应尽可能在重新组装完成后灭菌。

instruction:
已知信息：

'Summary of batch production and testing records of biological products refers to a document summarizing the testing results on all production processes and critical quality control links of a certain batch of biological products. 'Summary of batch production and testing records of biological products refers to a document summarizing the testing results on all production processes and critical quality control links of a certain batch of biological products. Such document shall be reviewed and determined by the quality management department and the qualified person of the enterprise.'可被翻译为：生物制品批生产及检验记录摘要，是指概述某一批生物制品全部生产工艺流程和质量控制关键环节检验结果的文件。该文件应当由企业质量管理部门和质量受权人审核确定。

根据上述已知信息，请将'(V)  Summary of batch production and testing records signed by the qualified person and affixed with the seal of the enterprise;'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: （五）质量受权人签字并加盖企业公章的批生产及检验记录摘要；

instruction:
已知信息：
'Based on the recommendation above, and with reference to the conditions set forth in this annex, the pharmacopoeial texts referenced in Section 2.1 of this annex can be considered interchangeable. However, FDA might request that a company demonstrate that the chosen method is acceptable and suitable for a specific material or product, irrespective of the origin of the method.'可被翻译为：基于上述建议，并结合本附录的相关规定，可认为本附录第2.1节中相关药典文本具有同等效力。但是，不论该方法源自何处，FDA都可能会要求企业证明其所选方法的合理性并适用于某一特定的物料或产品的质量控制。
'The ICH Steering Committee, based on the evaluation by the Q4B Expert Working Group (EWG), recommends that the official pharmacopoeial texts, the Section in Ph.Eur. 2.2.31. Electrophoresis entitled Sodium Dodecyl Sulphate Polyacrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE), JP General Information 23. SDS-Polyacrylamide Gel Electrophoresis, and USP <1056> Biotechnology-derived Articles – Polyacrylamide Gel Electrophoresis, can be used as interchangeable in the ICH regions.'可被翻译为：经Q4B专家工作组（EWG）审核，ICH指导委员会建议，欧洲药典附录2.2.31（十二烷基 硫酸钠-聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳（SDS-PAGE））、日本药典一般信息23（SDS-聚丙烯酰胺凝胶 电泳）和美国药典附录<1056>（生物技术相关文件 - 聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳），中各自规定的 分析方法在ICH区域中具有同等效力。
'2.1 Analytical Procedures The ICH Steering Committee, based on the evaluation by the Q4B Expert Working Group (EWG), recommends that the official pharmacopoeial texts, Ph.Eur. 20414 Sulphated Ash, JP 2.44 Residue on Ignition Test, and USP <281> Residue on Ignition can be used as interchangeable in the ICH regions given the following:'可被翻译为：2.1 分析方法 经Q4B专家工作组（EWG）审核，ICH指导委员会建议，欧洲药典附录20414（硫酸灰 分）、日本药典附录2.44（炽灼残渣检查法）和美国药典附录281（炽灼残渣）中各自规定的 分析方法在ICH区域中具有同等效力。
'The working documents received from the PDG or one or more pharmacopoeial sources (USP, Ph. Eur., or JP) that contain the proposed pharmacopoeial text and any other support documents provided for Q4B evaluation.'可被翻译为：从药典讨论组或一个或多个药典机构(美国药典、欧洲药典或日本药典)获 得的工作文件(包含推荐采纳的药典文本和任何其他用于 Q4B 评价的支持性文 件)的过程。

根据上述已知信息，请将'Where such status is indicated, any of the official texts from JP, EP, or USP can be substituted one for the other (appropriately referenced) in the ICH regions for purposes of the pharmaceutical registration/approval process. Using any of the interchangeable methods, an analyst will reach the same accept or reject decisions irrespective of which PDG pharmacopeia is used.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 这种情况是指，就药品的注册/审批程序而言，在 ICH 区域内，来自日本药典、欧洲药典或美国药典的特定文本均可互相替代(在恰当引用的前提下)。对于任何可互相替代的方法，分析人员均可得出相同的可接受或不可接受的结论。 而无需考虑该文本是来自哪一个具体的 PDG 成员国药典。

instruction:
已知信息：
'Data elements beginning with ACK.B contain information relating to each ICSR message within the received batch. This B section contains information related to each ICSR message within a batch, including any errors detected within the message.'可被翻译为：以ACK.B开头的数据元素包含与接收到的批次中的每份ICSR消息相关的信息元素消息。B 节包含与批次内的每份ICSR相关的信息，包括该消息内检测到的任何错误消息。
'ACK.A.1 ICSR Batch Number User Guidance This data element identifies the transaction (that is the batch) that is being acknowledged.'可被翻译为：ACK.A.1 ICSR批号 用户指导原则 该数据元素标识正在确认的交易元素（批处理）。
'4.2 ICH ICSR Acknowledgement Message The Acknowledgement header contains core transactional information related to the receipt of the batch transmission. The data elements used for the ICH ICSR Acknowledgement are described below.'可被翻译为：4.2 ICH ICSR确认消息确认消息 确认页眉包含与批量传输接收相关的核心交易信息。用于ICH ICSR确认的数据元素如下所述。

instruction:

'Usually, a criterion based on bowel movement frequency – however, with additional features, such as spontaneity and completeness (CSBM), and potential additional other features such as normal consistency (BSFS 3-4) can be used, comparing the change from baseline to the end of treatment.'可被翻译为：通常，纳入标准应该基于排便次数和一些附加的症状如自发性和完整性（CSBM），以及潜在的其他特征如标准稠度（BSFS 3-4） 等，比较在治疗结束时相比于基线的变化。

'Later, the total frequency was restricted to so called “spontaneous bowel movements” (SBMs), or “complete spontaneous bowel movements” (CSBMs).'可被翻译为：后来，总次数被限于所谓的“自发排便”（SBM）或“完全自发排便”（CSBM）。

根据上述已知信息，请将'In the meantime, until such an instrument is available, the use of a primary endpoint based on CSBMs will be considered to be acceptable because it incorporates spontaneity (without intake of any “rescue” medication (or any other laxative, including enema or suppository) within 24 hours before the bowel movement), as well as completeness, of the bowel movement.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 与此同时，在这样的工具完善之前，使用基于 CSBM的主要终点将被认为是可以接受的，因为它包含自发（排便之前的24小时之内未服用任何“救援”药物（或任何其他的泻药，包括灌肠剂或栓剂））以及良好的排便。

instruction:

'The China Cancer Immunotherapy Workshop has been successfully held for five consecutive years with rising social attention and influence. The Workshop has provided an important academic exchange platform for Chinese and foreign drug regulatory authorities, academia and industry, promoting the exchange of professional knowledge and experience in the field of cancer immunotherapy. It has played a positive role in promoting international exchanges and cooperation in the field of drug regulation and enhancing innovation and development in the field of cancer immunotherapy.'可被翻译为：中国肿瘤免疫治疗会议已连续成功举办了5届，社会关注度和影响力不断扩大，会议为中外药品监管机构、学术界、企业界搭建了一个重要学术交流平台，促进了肿瘤免疫治疗领域的专业知识和经验交流，为推动我国药品监管领域的国际交流合作和肿瘤免疫治疗领域创新发展发挥了积极的作用。
'In the Workshop, Dr. Ronald Levy, who is the Member of US National Academy of Sciences, Member of US National Academy of Medicine, professor of Stanford University, was specially invited to deliver a keynote speech entitled In Situ Therapeutic Vaccination and share the experience and views on clinical research progress. Prof.Lieping Chen of Yale University, Prof. Xuetao Cao of Nankai University, Prof.Yilong Wu, Prof. Jun Zhu and other famous experts also shared their latest achievements in the field of cancer immunotherapy and put forward their views from the perspective of clinical research and patient needs.'可被翻译为：本次会议特别邀请了美国国家科学院院士、美国国家医学院院士、斯坦福大学罗纳德•莱维(Ronald Levy)教授，发表了题为“原位治疗性疫苗”的主旨演讲，分享了原位治疗性疫苗临床研究进展等方面的经验与看法。耶鲁大学陈列平教授、南开大学校长曹雪涛院士、我国著名肿瘤领域专家吴一龙教授、朱军教授等也分享了肿瘤免疫治疗领域的最新成果，从临床研究和患者需求的角度提出了观点和经验。
'Focusing on the hot issues in the field of cancer immunotherapy, the Workshop setup 7 topics including Immune Resistance and Combination Therapy, Emerging New Immunotherapy, Perspective from Biopharma Industry, Clinical Update on Checkpoint Inhibitors, Clinical Update on Cellular Therapy and Regulatory Considerations.'可被翻译为：会议围绕肿瘤免疫治疗领域热点问题设置了免疫耐药和联合疗法、肿瘤免疫新型疗法、生物制药界视角-研发者说、检查点抑制剂的临床治疗进展、细胞疗法的临床进展、监管考量等7个专题。

根据上述已知信息，请将'More than 50 Chinese and foreign leading experts in the field of cancer immunotherapy, including US FDA, EMA, CDE, CAHON delivered speeches on the current status and hot topics of cancer immunotherapy and interactively communicated with the participants.'翻译为中文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 美国FDA、欧盟药品监管机构、国家药品监督管理局药品审评中心、美国华裔血液及肿瘤专家学会等50余位中外肿瘤免疫治疗学术界顶尖专家针对当前肿瘤免疫治疗的现状和热点进行演讲，并与参会代表进行互动交流。国内外学术机构代表、从事肿瘤免疫治疗临床研究的专家学者和生物制药企业代表参加了会议。
